.. _pht_rest_api:

Proposal Handling Tool REST API
=================================

A SwaggerUI for the latest main branch of the API is available at

https://k8s.stfc.skao.int/integration-ska-oso-services/oso/api/v2/ui/PPT and https://k8s.stfc.skao.int/integration-ska-oso-services/oso/api/v2/ui/PMT



The PHT API supports resources for proposal preparation and Management. 

* Proposal Preparation: 

.. openapi:: ./_static/proposal.json
   :encoding: utf-8


* Proposal Management:
  
.. openapi:: ./_static/proposal_management.json
   :encoding: utf-8
